mapper.select: SELECT MEM_ACC_ID, MEM_ACC_NAME FROM FCM0006M WHERE MEM_ACC_ID LIKE '%' || #{supplier} || '%'
SELECT COST_CENTER_TEXT FROM FCM0008M WHERE COST_CENTER = #{costCentr} AND END_DT >= SYSDATE
SELECT BUDGET_CODE, BUDGET_CODE_TEXT FROM FCM0010M WHERE BUDGET_CODE LIKE '%' || #{bgtCd} || '%' AND END_DT >= SYSDATE

SELECT FCM0104D.GL_ACC_CODE, FCM0009M.GL_ACC_DESC, FCM0104D.CNTRL_TYPE FROM FCM0104D INNER JOIN FCM0009M ON FCM0104D.GL_ACC_CODE = FCM0009M.GL_ACC_CODE WHERE FCM0104D.COST_CENTR = #{costCentr} AND FCM0104D.BUDGET_CODE LIKE '%' || #{bgtCd} || '%'
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO FCM0024T ( SEQ, GRP_SEQ, COST_CENTER, COST_CENTER_NAME, SUPPLIER, SUPPLIER_NAME, INVC_NO, INVC_DT, PAY_DT, BILL_PERIOD_FR, BILL_PERIOD_TO, BUDGET_CODE, BUDGET_NAME, GL_ACC_NO, GL_ACC_NAME, AMT, EXP_DESC, UTIL_NO, JPAY_NO, CRT_DT, CRT_USER_ID, UPD_DT, UPD_USER_ID )
SELECT #{seq}, #{item.grpSeq}, #{item.costCentr}, #{item.costCentrNm}, #{item.supplier}, #{item.supplierNm}, #{item.invcNo}, TO_DATE(#{item.invcDt}, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_DATE(#{item.payDueDt}, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_DATE(NVL(#{item.billPeriodFr}, ''), 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_DATE(NVL(#{item.billPeriodTo}, ''), 'YYYYMMDD'), #{item.bgtCd}, #{item.bgtNm}, #{item.glAccNo}, #{item.glAccNm}, #{item.amt}, #{item.expDesc}, #{item.utilNo}, #{item.jPayNo}, SYSDATE, #{userId}, SYSDATE, #{userId} FROM DUAL
mapper.select:
SELECT
'-' CLM_NO,
CLM_NO,
COST_CENTER || ' - ' || COST_CENTER_NAME COST_CENTER, SUPPLIER || ' - ' || SUPPLIER_NAME SUPPLIER, INVC_NO, TO_CHAR(INVC_DT, 'DD-MM-YYYY') INVC_DT, TO_CHAR(PAY_DT, 'DD-MM-YYYY') PAY_DT, NVL(TO_CHAR(BILL_PERIOD_FR, 'DD-MM-YYYY'), '-') BILL_PERIOD_FR, NVL(TO_CHAR(BILL_PERIOD_TO, 'DD-MM-YYYY'), '-') BILL_PERIOD_TO, BUDGET_CODE || ' - ' || BUDGET_NAME BUDGET, GL_ACC_NO || ' - ' || GL_ACC_NAME GL_ACC, AMT, EXP_DESC, UTIL_NO, JPAY_NO
FROM FCM0024T WHERE SEQ = #{seq} ORDER BY GRP_SEQ
FROM FCM0026D WHERE FCM0026D.BATCH_ID = #{batchId} ORDER BY CLM_NO, CLM_SEQ

SELECT SEQ BATCH_ID, GRP_SEQ, COST_CENTER, COST_CENTER_NAME, SUPPLIER, SUPPLIER_NAME, INVC_NO, INVC_DT, PAY_DT, BILL_PERIOD_FR, BILL_PERIOD_TO, BUDGET_CODE, BUDGET_NAME, GL_ACC_NO, GL_ACC_NAME, AMT, EXP_DESC, UTIL_NO, JPAY_NO FROM FCM0024T WHERE SEQ = #{seq} order by GRP_SEQ
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FCM0025M ( BATCH_ID, TOTAL_CLAIMS, APPV_PRCSS_NO, ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID, REM, CRT_DT, CRT_USER_ID, UPD_DT, UPD_USER_ID ) VALUES ( #{batchId}, #{totCnt}, #{appvPrcssNo}, #{atchFileGrpId}, #{rem}, SYSDATE, #{userId}, SYSDATE, #{userId} )

INSERT INTO FCM0026D ( BATCH_ID, CLM_NO, CLM_SEQ, COST_CENTER, COST_CENTER_NAME, SUPPLIER, SUPPLIER_NAME, INVC_NO, INVC_DT, PAY_DT, BILL_PERIOD_FR, BILL_PERIOD_TO, BUDGET_CODE, BUDGET_NAME, GL_ACC_NO, GL_ACC_NAME, AMT, EXP_DESC, UTIL_NO, JPAY_NO, CLAM_UN, REM, CRT_DT, CRT_USER_ID, UPD_DT, UPD_USER_ID )VALUES ( #{batchId}, #{clmNo}, #{seq}, #{costCenter}, #{costCenterName}, #{supplier}, #{supplierName}, #{invcNo}, TO_DATE(#{invcDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{payDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), NVL(TO_DATE(#{billPeriodFr}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), ''), NVL(TO_DATE(#{billPeriodTo}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), ''), #{budgetCode}, #{budgetName}, #{glAccNo}, #{glAccName}, #{amt}, #{expDesc}, #{utilNo}, #{jpayNo}, #{clamUn}, #{rem}, SYSDATE, #{userId}, SYSDATE, #{userId} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.APPV_PRCSS_STUS, A.APPV_PRCSS_DT, A.APPV_LINE_CNT, A.APPV_LINE_PRCSS_CNT, B.APPV_LINE_SEQ, B.APPV_DT, B.APPV_STUS FROM FCM0004M A INNER JOIN FCM0005D B ON A.APPV_PRCSS_NO = B.APPV_PRCSS_NO AND B.APPV_STUS = 'R' WHERE A.APPV_PRCSS_NO = #{appvPrcssNo} /*AND (A.APPV_LINE_PRCSS_CNT + 1) = b.APPV_LINE_SEQ*/ ORDER BY B.APPV_LINE_SEQ

SELECT A.REQST_USER_ID, TO_CHAR(A.REQST_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY') REQST_DT, A.APPV_PRCSS_STUS, A.APPV_PRCSS_DT, A.APPV_LINE_CNT, A.APPV_LINE_PRCSS_CNT, B.APPV_LINE_SEQ, NVL(TO_CHAR(B.APPV_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY'), '-') APPV_DT, B.APPV_STUS, C.USER_NAME APPV_LINE_USER_NAME FROM FCM0025M M INNER JOIN FCM0004M A ON M.APPV_PRCSS_NO = A.APPV_PRCSS_NO INNER JOIN FCM0005D B ON A.APPV_PRCSS_NO = B.APPV_PRCSS_NO INNER JOIN SYS0047M C ON B.APPV_LINE_USER_ID = C.HR_CODE WHERE M.BATCH_ID = #{batchId} ORDER BY B.APPV_LINE_SEQ
mapper.update: UPDATE FCM0004M SET APPV_PRCSS_STUS = #{appvPrcssStus}, APPV_PRCSS_DT = SYSDATE, APPV_LINE_PRCSS_CNT = #{appvLinePrcssCnt}, UPD_DT = SYSDATE, UPD_USER_ID = #{userId} WHERE APPV_PRCSS_NO = #{appvPrcssNo}
mapper.select: SELECT B.CLM_NO DOCENTRY, SUBSTR(B.CLM_NO, 1, 2) DOCETY, TO_CHAR(C.REQST_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') REQDATE, C.REQST_USER_ID REQPERNM, B.COST_CENTER_NAME REQDEPTNM, TO_CHAR(B.INVC_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') DOCDATE, B.SUPPLIER CARDCODE, B.CLM_SEQ LINEID, B.INVC_NO INVONO, B.CLAM_UN CLAM_UN, B.CLM_NO REGINO, TO_CHAR(B.PAY_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') REFDATE, B.EXP_DESC LINEMEMO, B.GL_ACC_NO ACCTCODE, B.GL_ACC_NAME ACCTNAME, B.AMT, 0 VATAMT, 0 VAT_NON, B.AMT TAMT, 'VB' VATCODE, B.COST_CENTER DIMENSION1, B.BUDGET_CODE DIMENSION2, C.APPV_PRCSS_STUS STATUS, B.JPAY_NO JOMPNO, B.UTIL_NO UTLACNO FROM FCM0025M A INNER JOIN FCM0026D B ON A.BATCH_ID = B.BATCH_ID INNER JOIN FCM0004M C ON A.APPV_PRCSS_NO = C.APPV_PRCSS_NO WHERE A.APPV_PRCSS_NO = #{appvPrcssNo} ORDER BY B.CLM_NO, B.CLM_SEQ
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ITF0700M ( IF_KEY, SEQ, IF_TYPE, TRAN_STATUS_CD, RGST_DT, RGST_TM, RGST_ID, DOCENTRY, DOCETY, REQDATE, REQPERNM, REQDEPTNM, DOCDATE, DUEDATE, CARDCODE, LINEID, INVONO, CLAM_UN, REGINO, REFDATE, LINEMEMO, ACCTCODE, ACCTNAME, AMT, VATAMT, VAT_NON, TAMT, VATCODE, DIMENSION1, DIMENSION2, STATUS, JOMPNO, UTLACNO ) VALUES ( #{ifKey}, 1, '700', '10', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), #{userId}, #{docentry}, #{docety}, #{reqdate}, #{reqpernm}, #{reqdeptnm}, #{docdate}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), #{cardcode}, #{lineid}, #{invono}, #{clamUn}, #{regino}, #{refdate}, #{linememo}, #{acctcode}, #{acctname}, #{amt}, 0, 0, #{tamt}, 'VB', #{dimension1}, #{dimension2}, #{status}, #{jompno}, #{utlacno} )
mapper.select: SELECT CODE FROM SYS0094M WHERE IND = 'BULK_INVC'
SELECT DISTINCT CLM_NO FROM FCM0026D WHERE BATCH_ID = #{batchId}
SELECT REJCT_RESN FROM FCM0004M A, FCM0005D B WHERE A.APPV_PRCSS_NO = B.APPV_PRCSS_NO AND A.APPV_PRCSS_NO = #{appvPrcssNo} AND A.APPV_LINE_PRCSS_CNT = B.APPV_LINE_SEQ
